media.title: Hold On To Me - Mayday Parade (Bethan Mary Leadley Cover)

mainContent.author: acousitcbethan
mainContent.description:
Published on Jan 29, 2014
Make sure you get check out their album on itunes (is well creepy sick) https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/mon...
Artist Mayday Parade Category Music License Standard YouTube License

comment.sentence: Befon <3 you get better every day <3
Was there a tutorial video or something you found to learn this? Bc I can't find any
I love all of your acoustic covers and songs! Your voice fits well with acoustic music!! :) Truly beautiful.
Check out my new cover of @Mayday_Parade's Hold On To Me on my cover channel!
this is your best cover ever! You sang it really beautifully and this type of music really brings out the best in your voice. I love it.
Can you please do a tutorial for this?? or make a tab??
I saw them at Warped a couple days ago and got to wish Derek a happy birthday. Your voice was absolutely amazing for this song and acoustic covers. stay wonderful and beautiful <3
What's funny is we were at the same concert but I didn't get to stop you and say hi :/
You're an amazing singer and you're really pretty.
